stat.name: Hit Points
stat.desc: Hit points. The unit is removed from the battle if HP reaches 0.

stat.name: Strength
stat.desc: Strength. The higher the number, the more damage you inflict.

stat.name: Magic
stat.desc: Magical power. Increases spell and staff effectiveness.

stat.name: Skill
stat.desc: Fighting skill. A higher number improves accuracy.

stat.name: Speed
stat.desc: This affects both evasion and attack speed.

stat.name: Constitution
stat.desc: Constitution. Affects how well the unit can wield heavier weapons.

stat.name: Movement
stat.desc: The distance you can move in one turn.
